meanings.definition: Not equipped with or connected to a computer.
meanings.sent2: Her uncomputerized phone could only make calls.
meanings.sent3: The uncomputerized alarm clock woke him up every morning.
meanings.sent4: The uncomputerized car required manual navigation.
meanings.sent5: Living in an uncomputerized cabin felt like stepping back in time.

meanings.definition: Not processed or stored using a computer.
meanings.sent2: The ancient scrolls were uncomputerized records.
meanings.sent3: His uncomputerized brain memorized all the information.
meanings.sent4: The uncomputerized filing system caused delays.
meanings.sent5: The uncomputerized library relied on card catalogs.

meanings.definition: Not automated or controlled by a computer.
meanings.sent1: The uncomputerized factory required manual labor.
meanings.sent3: The uncomputerized traffic lights caused chaos.
meanings.sent4: The uncomputerized irrigation system needed constant monitoring.
meanings.sent5: The uncomputerized watch needed winding every day.
